name: .THE File Extension
summary: Learn about .THE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Theme or Plus Pack used by Microsoft Plus!, an operating system enhancement program for Windows; contains settings and other data that can change the look and feel of the Windows interface; may also include additional programs, utilities, and games.

content: After the release of Windows Vista, Microsoft discontinued Plus! software. Optional features for Vista are available via "Windows Ultimate Extras."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
